thread.title: Killam Apartment REIT Announces Timing of First Quarter 2018 Results and Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Killam Apartment REIT Announces Timing of First Quarter 2018 Results and Conference Call
text:
HALIFAX, Nova Scotia, April 09, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Killam Apartment REIT (TSX:KMP.UN) will be releasing its financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2018, on Wednesday, May 9, 2018, after the market closes. A webcast and conference call to discuss these results and current business initiatives will be held on Thursday, May 10, 2018, at 1:00 PM EDT.
The webcast will be accessible on Killam’s website at the following link http://www.killamreit.com/investor-relations/events-and-presentations . A replay will be available for 90 days after the webcast at the same link.
The dial-in numbers for the conference call are:
North America (toll free): 1 (866) 521-4909, passcode 95978088
International: 1 (647) 427-2311, passcode 95978088
About Killam Apartment REIT
Killam Apartment REIT, based in Halifax, Nova Scotia, is one of Canada’s largest residential landlords, owning, operating and developing a $2.4 billion portfolio of apartments and manufactured home communities. Killam’s strategy to enhance value and profitability focuses on three priorities: 1) increasing earnings from existing operations, 2) expanding the portfolio and diversifying geographically through accretive acquisitions, with an emphasis on newer properties, and 3) developing high-quality properties in its core markets.
For information, please contact:
Dale Noseworthy, CPA, CA, CFA
Chief Financial Officer
dnoseworthy@killamreit.com
(902) 442-0388
Source: Killam Apartment REIT
